content.text:
An experiment on antisocial media.
Send a PR to remy.wang/particles to make a post, and he will publish it if it makes him happy!
Just discovered BRUIT<=, haven't felt like this listening to a band in a very long time. Check out their KEXP performance and their music on bandcamp! - Remy
They have toots for mastodon, we have ... *particles* for the particle web! I call dibs to the first ever particle in the universe :) - Remy
